Class ApplicationManagementCLI

Object
ApplicationManagementCLI
public class ApplicationManagementCLI extends Object
CLI interface for managing BTO applications.

Used by both HDB Officers and HDB Managers. Officers handle flat selection and receipt generation, while managers handle approvals, withdrawals, and reporting.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Javier

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationManagementCLI

      public ApplicationManagementCLI(HDBManager manager, ApplicationController applicationController, Map<String,Filter> userFilters)
      Constructs the CLI for HDB Managers to manage applications.
      Parameters:
      manager - The logged-in HDB Manager.
      applicationController - The controller handling application data.
      userFilters - Shared filter map per user (by NRIC).

    • ApplicationManagementCLI

      public ApplicationManagementCLI(HDBOfficer officer, ApplicationController applicationController, OfficerController officerController)
      Constructs the CLI for HDB Officers to assign flats and generate receipts.
      Parameters:
      officer - The logged-in HDB Officer.
      applicationController - The controller handling application data.
      officerController - The controller handling officer logic.

  • Method Details

    • setBreadcrumb

      public void setBreadcrumb(Breadcrumb breadcrumb)
      Sets the breadcrumb for CLI navigation.
      Parameters:
      breadcrumb - The breadcrumb instance to track navigation.

    • start

      public void start()
      Launches the main application management flow based on role.

    • officerManagement

      private void officerManagement()
      Displays the menu and handles officer-specific operations: flat assignment and receipt generation.

    • officerMenu

      private void officerMenu()
      Prints the officer-facing menu.

    • flatSelectionWorkflow

      private void flatSelectionWorkflow()
      Lets the officer assign flats to successful applicants from their project.

    • generateReceipt

      private void generateReceipt()
      Generates a receipt for a flat-booked application.

    • managerManagement

      private void managerManagement()
      Displays the menu and handles manager-specific operations: approving/rejecting applications, approving withdrawals, and generating reports.

    • printManagerMenu

      private void printManagerMenu()
      Prints the manager-facing menu.

    • viewAllApplicationsForProject

      private void viewAllApplicationsForProject()
      Displays all applications under the manager's handled projects.

    • processApplication

      private void processApplication()
      Allows the manager to approve or reject pending applications.

    • approveWithdrawal

      private void approveWithdrawal()
      Handles approval or rejection of withdrawal requests.

    • generateReport

      private void generateReport()
      Displays a summary report of applications that have completed flat booking.

    • collectApplicationFilterInput

      private void collectApplicationFilterInput()
      Prompts the user for filter inputs such as marital status, flat type, project names, age range, and application status. Updates the shared filter object accordingly.

    • printReport

      private void printReport(List<Application> result)
      Prints a formatted table displaying details of all applications in the given list. Includes applicant information, flat type, project name, and application status.
      Parameters:
      result - the list of applications to display in the report

    • clearFilters

      private void clearFilters()
      Asks the user whether to reset all active filters. If confirmed, clears the shared filter object and prints confirmation.
